column1: Local Foods////Because my friend and I were deep in conversation
column2: I didn't notice that my food was taking a little longer. So
column4: I was just happy to dig in
column5: not perturbed at all by the wait. Just a few minutes later
column6: one of the managers came by
column7: apologized for the wait (which I hardly noticed)
column8: and gave me a "free lunch" card to use for next time. It felt like Christmas came early!!
